Interface TestRunner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

      • setProperty

        ValidationResult setProperty(String propertyName,
                             String propertyValue)
        Updates the value of the property with the given PropertyDescriptor to the specified value IF and ONLY IF the value is valid according to the descriptor's validator. Otherwise, Assert.fail() is called, causing the unit test to fail
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name
        propertyValue - value
        Returns:
        result

        Enqueues the given Records into the Processor's input queue
        Parameters:

      • enqueue

        void enqueue(String key,
             String value)
        Creates a Record with the content set to the given string (in UTF-8 format), with no attributes, and adds this Record to the Processor's Input Queue.

        the key will be set as empty string if keyValueSeparator is empty

        Parameters:
        key - the key/value separator of the message
        value - the key of the message

      • enqueue

        void enqueue(String keyValueSeparator,
             InputStream inputStream)
        Creates a Record with the content set to the given inputuStrem (in UTF-8 format), with no attributes, and adds this Record to the Processor's Input Queue

        the key will be set as empty string if keyValueSeparator is empty

        Parameters:
        keyValueSeparator - the key of all messages message
        inputStream - the inputstream containing all the messages lines

      • enqueue

        void enqueue(InputStream inputStream)
        Creates a Record with the content set to the given inputuStrem (in UTF-8 format), with no attributes, and adds this Record to the Processor's Input Queue
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the inputstream containing all the messages lines

      • removeProperty

        boolean removeProperty(PropertyDescriptor descriptor)
        Removes the PropertyDescriptor from the ProcessContext, effectively setting its value to null, or the property's default value, if it has one.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - of property to remove
        Returns:
        true if removed, false if the property was not set

      • setVariable

        void setVariable(String name,
                 String value)
        Sets the value of the variable with the given name to be the given value. This exposes the variable for use by the Expression Language.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the variable to set
        value - the value of the variable
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either the name or the value is null

      • getVariableValue

        String getVariableValue(String name)
        Returns the current value of the variable with the given name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the variable whose value should be returned.
        Returns:
        the current value of the variable with the given name or null if no value is currently set
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the name is null

      • removeVariable

        String removeVariable(String name)
        Removes the variable with the given name from this Test Runner, if it is set.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the variable to remove
        Returns:
        the value that was set for the variable, or null if the variable was not set
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the name is null
